author: SegmentLinking
body:
This PR fixes a couple of relatively minor bugs that were affecting the standalone part of LST.

The main bug that was fixed, was due to the recent update of ROOT in CMSSW. Some of our code was sensitive to the changes in the headers, and caused the `abs` function to not be the one we expected, so it was returning integers instead of floats. We switched to `std::abs` to fix the issue, following modern guidelines.

We also fixed a miscounting that randomly happened and a potential out of bounds access.
title: Minor fixes to LST standalone code
